pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieve 'U.S'. Flu Season Data from the 'CDC' 'FluView' Portal // The 'U.S.' Centers for Disease Control ('CDC') maintains a portal http://gis.cdc.gov/grasp/fluview/fluportaldashboard.html for accessing state, regional and national influenza statistics as well as Mortality Surveillance Data. The web interface makes it difficult and time-consuming to select and retrieve influenza data. Tools are provided to access the data provided by the portal's underlying 'API'.
